text: Pierre Louis Rayer (25 May 1931 – 9 October 2024), known by his stage name Pierre Vernier, was a French actor. He was born in Saint-Jean-d'Angély, France. He was known for his roles in movies directed by Claude Lelouch such as in Itinerary of a Spoiled Child (1988), La Belle Histoire (1992) and Les Misérables (1995).
